title: Nobody's said it yet, so let me say it now.
body:
One of the favorite parts of Warwick's rework I love is some of the sound design. The best part, in my opinion, is this:
https://youtu.be/EfCxiNa_XCo?t=20

The roar sound effect is so awesome. I can't get over how badass, beastly, and overall powerful his roar sounds. When we get to updating champions like Volibear in a few years, I can't wait to see what they'll do with that beast.

Great job, SFX team!

replies.body:
It shall forever trigger me that "Primal Howl" is a roar, and not a howl. But it is an awesome sound.

Personally, I love the animation that plays when Warwick_ misses _ his ultimate; his claws leave great gashes in the ground as he tries to slow himself. I think I'll be seeing that animation a lot.

Thanks Melledoneus!

I'll definitely pass along the kind words. =)
